process_parameters.temperature_range: Range of temperatures used for the deposition process
process_parameters.pressure_range: Range of pressures used for the deposition process

film_properties.material: Chemical composition of the deposited film
film_properties.thickness_control: Methods and results of thickness control
film_properties.uniformity: Uniformity of the film across the substrate
film_properties.conformality: Conformality of the film on 3D structures
film_properties.surface_roughness: Surface roughness of the deposited film
film_properties.refractive_index: Refractive index of the deposited film

process_characteristics.self_limiting_behavior: Evidence of self-limiting behavior in the ALD process
process_characteristics.growth_per_cycle: Growth per cycle observed in the process

safety: Safety considerations for the process and materials
stability: Stability of the deposited films over time
reproducibility: Reproducibility of the film thickness and properties
precursor_consumption: Efficiency and consumption rate of precursors
device_performance: Performance of the ALD films in practical devices

presence_checks.property 1: Yes if property 1 is investigated, otherwise no
presence_checks.property 2: Yes if property 2 is investigated, otherwise no
